Sign up to NCS with The Challenge
Say Yes to NCS Say Yes to £35 offer Say yes to NCS YES Live
Dear{!Contact.FirstName},
You recently told us you are interested in NCS with The Challenge...
Sign up before 26th Feb & you could win tickets to NCS YES Live
This event is an exclusive gig for 16-17 year olds Confirmed artists include:
Nina Nesbitt, Elli Ingram, Joel Compass, Neon Jungle,Swiss Lips & Olivia Sebastianelli.
We hope you will be able to take part in NCS this year! The quickest way to apply is online. We already have an account for you, so to continue your application please recover your log in & sign up. Your parent/ guardian can then complete your application to receive the discounted rate of £35.
NCS with The Challenge is a fun, action-packed part-residential programme designed exclusively for 15-17 year olds. On the programme, you will build self-confidence as well as skills in leadership, teamwork and communication. Employers and universities also recognise the unique value of the programme, helping you to stand out in the future.
For more info about NCS with The Challenge visit our website NCSTheChallenge.org or see our Frequently Asked Questions.
Thank you, The Challenge
